name: AR Pong
description:
Play Beer Pong in Augmented Reality with AR Pong!

AR Pong is THE destination for FREE mobile augmented reality. With lightning-fast floor detection and realistic tables, you can compete & enjoy multiple game modes with friends online or local!


Game Modes


Single Player - Challenge our CPU in 1v1 table games with realistic physics and the official rules used by the World Series of Beer Pong. Watch out, the more you play, the harder our CPU gets.

Multiplayer - Play with friends anywhere in the world for free. Table games can be played in augmented reality or Disable AR for quick back to back games.

Trick Shot - Rack up the coins and test your skills in the Augmented Reality Trick Shot. Climb the leaderboards with achievements and crown yourself the furthest distance.

Store

Earn coins in-game and reward yourself with Realistic tables, cups, liquids, and balls.
Customize your experience and choose your setup. The combinations are limitless with 57 different items in the store.


Key Features:
-It’s Free
⁃Augmented Reality App
⁃Beer Pong Game
⁃Table Mode
⁃Trick Shot
⁃Different Cups, Tables, Balls, and Liquids
⁃Disable Augmented Reality and Play On The Go
